posts._title: Sylvestre Amoussou – Africa paradis AKA Africa Paradise (2006)
posts.title: Africa paradis
posts.excerpt: When Olivier and Pauline, a French engineer and a French teacher, can not live decently in their own country any longer, they decide to emigrate to the United States of Africa.
